com.glyart.mystral.datasource

Class HikariFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glyart.mystral.datasource.HikariFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceFactory<com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource>

    public class HikariFactory
extends Object
implements DataSourceFactory<com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource>
    This class represents a component that lazily initializes a HikariDataSource.
    This prevents errors during instantiation via constructor.
